column2: L-3 Communications fires four for misconduct in aerospace unitUPDATE 3-Whistleblower alerted L-3 to accounting misconduct * Shares down as much as 17 pct   (Adds detail from sources familiar with situation)  UPDATE 3-Whistleblower alerted L-3 to accounting misconduct * Shares down as much as 17 pct   (Adds detail from sources familiar with situation) July 31 L-3 Communications Holdings Inc  said it had fired four employees as part of an ongoing internal review that revealed overstatement of net sales and deferred cost overruns in the company's aerospace business.UPDATE 3-Whistleblower alerted L-3 to accounting misconduct * Shares down as much as 17 pct   (Adds detail from sources familiar with situation)
